name: Gravity Ballz
description:
Version: 0.1.0

Gravity Ballz

Creators: Shiva M and Aleks V

WAD and arrow keys to change gravity's direction. Also supports mouse and touch screens.  Goal is to reach the end portal.

Hit R to restart a level, at the cost of 2 points.

Hit spacebar, w, or up arrow key to jump.

Please leave your thoughts and comments below.
